tile.text: Before you realize it your weapon is in hand, Ursala is even quicker. Faster than you can follow her hand darts out, a whirling blur passes straight through one of the murky shapes, it lodges in the trunk of a tree, finally recognizable as a dagger. A full second later the creature explodes in a shower of sparks and muck, leaving you totally dumbfounded. Only when it happens again do you notice the tall cloaked figure striding at your enemy with even steps, a staff outstretched. As the ethereal creatures continue to rise out of the mist, he methodically destroys each one, lighting crackling from his weapon. For a second you simply stand there, unsure what to do.

link.text: Destroy the evil magic user while he is still distracted.
Rush to the aid of your new ally.
It looks like he's got it under control, probably better not to get in the way.
